description:
The Microstock is a marketing system online photographs . This formula sale and purchase of images , has revolutionized the market of photographic industry on par with any photographer has opened a possible way of marketing their snapshots.

With this new and exclusive course you know, understand and implement the requirements for accessing this system to sell your photos . With it you can realize yourself professionally as a microstock photographer and provide an economic resource to your liking.

Both financial supplement, or as independent career, this course presents an interesting option for those talented photographer, sensitivity and willingness to work with your camera.

A course presented in HD 10 video tutorials . Locutadas clear and pedagogical study units. With  summaries and diagrams contained in the. PDF of each unit. FINAL EXAM.
